alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Rapides; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 10:55PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rapides, Avoyelles and north central St. Landry Parishes through 1130 PM CDT... At 1054 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moreauville, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marksville, Bunkie, Simmesport, Moreauville, Bordelonville, Morrow, Effie, Cottonport, Mansura, Hessmer, Evergreen, Plaucheville, Echo, Goudeau, Brouillette, Lake Ophelia National Wildlife Refuge, Big Cane, Dupont, Big Bend, and Hamburg. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 49 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
